column5: I was going to keep it a secret, but I was having a happy moment and decided to share   win a fishing trip with Bob Izumi or a copy of his cookbook...signed by him  you might find this number below helpful 62300-01853-6 you're see http://www.offcontest.ca/
I'll bring you on the trip if I win!  Thanks dude!
Terry if I win I'll give you the trip as I will be busy chasing chrome in Alaska.

Terry if I win I will take lots of Pics    Sorry some one had to say it first. It would be nice to meet you in person and this would be a great trip to do it on and YES I will pick your brain on Photo Shop. Thanks for the heads up
